p: We detected association signals for 15 genera that were microbiome-wide significant by both methods and reproduced robustly in the two datasets, with or without covariate adjustment (Table 2 and Fig. 2). Five genera had higher abundances in PD than in controls: Porphyromonas, Prevotella, Corynebacterium_1, Bifidobacterium, and Lactobacillus. Ten genera had lower abundances in PD than controls: Faecalibacterium, Agathobacter, Blautia, Roseburia, Fusicatenibacter, Lachnospira, Butyricicoccus, Lachnospiraceae_ND3007_group, Lachnospiraceae_UCG-004, and Oscillospira.
